about_the_game:
What is this game?

CRYO is a cooperative horror game that combines various horror elements, seen in many beloved horror titles, into a brand new experience set in the harsh landscape of Antarctica.

In CRYO, you and your team are technicians, sent to various locations within the antarctic circle at the behest of the powerful genetics company, ANGENEX. But these aren’t your run of the mill inspections. Communication has stopped and now, something sinister awaits. The cold is the least of your worries as terrifying, mutated abominations stalk the halls, hunting your every move. You’ll need to work together, strategize, and use your wits to survive and escape. Every decision matters, and every second counts in this high-stakes, cooperative horror experience. Will you make it out alive, or become just another frozen experiment? The choice is yours.

Features

  • AI. Monsters in CRYO are driven by a complex AI system that will use various sensory and environmental cues to help it hunt.

  • Multiple Monsters. Each game, a new monster is selected at random. Monsters behave differently to one another, some rely on brute force where as others will utilise the environment to sneak around.

  • Procedural item placement. Items are placed around the map each round in various logical locations. They can be hidden in cupboards and drawers, on desks or even behind locked doors.

  • Environmental Hazards. The antarctic is an unforgiving landscape. Players will need to plan ahead if they wish to succeed.

  • Escape Routes. Should you wish to succeed, you will need to find a way out. There are multiple options of escape each map, however, many will have limited spaces...

  • Difficulty. CRYO has multiple difficulty options that scale both the scarceness of items but also increase the intelligence of the AI. Teamwork and quick thinking will serve you well.

  • Collectibles and Achievements. CRYO will feature various cosmetics to unlock and achievements to be earned.

  • Co-op at heart. While playable solo, teamwork will make your life easy. Everything is designed with cooperative play in mind.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains gore and frightening scenes. Some assets may affect those with trypophobia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Current Gen i5 / i3 | Ryzen 5 2600
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note, this is the lowest spec we have tested that is able to run the game. You may be able to run the game with lower hardware. We do not support integrated graphics.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Current Gen i5 / i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 or AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: CRYO is a multiplayer co-op survival horror. You have been deployed by your company to various locations around the Antarctic due to communication issues. What awaits you in these dark, remote regions is far more sinister than a technical fault...
